text: Oh great, another boring superhero movie. Just what we needed.
Yeah, because the world really needed a fifth sequel.
Sure, this is definitely the best movie of the century. Not.
Wow, what an original plot. Never seen that before!
Brilliant! I loved every one of the 3 hours I'll never get back.
Amazing! It made me want to walk out after 10 minutes.
Fantastic acting. I could barely stay awake.
Best movie ever! If you enjoy watching paint dry.
Absolutely riveting. I only checked my phone 47 times.
Oscar-worthy performance! Said no one ever.
Well, that was two hours well spent. I guess.
I'm so glad I paid money to see this masterpiece.
Really lived up to the hype. Totally worth it.
Oh wow!!! Such an incredible story!!! Not predictable at all!!!
Amazing!!! Every cliche in the book!!! So creative!!!
Sure, the CGI was great. But everything else? Terrible.
Yeah, I 'loved' it. Just like I 'love' root canals.
